org.openscience.cdk.group

Class BondEquitablePartitionRefiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.group.AbstractEquitablePartitionRefiner
      • org.openscience.cdk.group.BondEquitablePartitionRefiner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEquitablePartitionRefiner

    @TestClass(value="BondEquitablePartitionRefinerTest")
public class BondEquitablePartitionRefiner
extends AbstractEquitablePartitionRefiner
implements IEquitablePartitionRefiner
    Refiner for atom containers, which refines partitions of the bonds to equitable partitions. Used by the BondDiscretePartitionRefiner.
    Author:
    maclean
    Belongs to CDK module:
    group
